title: Be Fully Persuaded | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Be Fully Persuaded | Joel Osteen
description:
When you’re fully persuaded, you’re confident that God is going to do exactly what He promised. Choose to dwell on thoughts of victory instead of doubt. Even when the odds are against you, make up your mind to believe that God can do the impossible.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
